anya-e1001n2:2: Nīti sāro manussānaṁ, mitto ācariyopi ca;
anya-e1001n2:3: Mātā pitā ca nītimā, sutavā ganthakārako.
anya-e1001n2:5: Alasassa kuto sippaṁ, asippassa kuto dhanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:6: Adhanassa kuto mittaṁ, amittassa kuto sukhaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:7: Asukhassa kuto puññaṁ, apuññassa kuto varaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:21: Sippasamaṁ dhanaṁ natthi, sippaṁ corā na gaṇhare;
anya-e1001n2:22: Idha loke sippaṁ mittaṁ, paraloke sukhāvahaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:24: Bhuñjanatthaṁ kathanatthaṁ, mukhaṁ hotīti no vade;
anya-e1001n2:25: Yaṁ vātaṁ vā mukhāruḷhaṁ, vacanaṁ paṇḍito naro.
anya-e1001n2:27: Dummedhehi pasaṁsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
anya-e1001n2:31: Upadesaṁ sadā gaṇhe, garuṁ sammā upaṭṭhahaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:33: Upadesaṁ sadā gaṇhe, garuṁ sammā upaṭṭhahaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:47: Paṇḍite ca guṇā sabbe, mūḷhe dosā hi kevalaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:55: Dhanañca naṁ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahu.
anya-e1001n2:57: Vijjā dadāti vinayaṁ, vinayā yāti pattataṁ;
anya-e1001n2:58: Pattattā dhanaṁ pappoti, dhanā dhammaṁ tato sukhaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:61: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṁsā, samparāye ca suggatiṁ.
anya-e1001n2:64: Attanīva sabbabhūtesu, yo passati so paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:69: Passāmi vohaṁ attānaṁ, yathā icchiṁ tathā ahu.
anya-e1001n2:77: Kiṁ kulena visālena, guṇahīno tu yo naro;
anya-e1001n2:81: Piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍitaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:84: Vijjāhīnā na sobhante, niggandhā iva kiṁ sukā.
anya-e1001n2:87: Sūrappabhāya ādāso, chāyaṁ disse na mākare.
anya-e1001n2:95: Mahātejopi tejoyaṁ, mattikaṁ na muduṁ kare;
anya-e1001n2:98: Kottho puttena jātena, yo na vidū na dhammiko;
anya-e1001n2:99: Kāṇena cakkhunā kiṁ vā, cakkhu pīḷeva kevalaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:101: Mudunāva ripuṁ jeti, mudunā jeti dāruṇaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:102: No na siddhaṁ mudu kiñci, tato ca mudunā jaye.
anya-e1001n2:104: Sajāto yena jātena, yāti vaṁso samunnatiṁ;
anya-e1001n2:105: Parivattinisaṁsāre, mato ko vā na jāyate.
anya-e1001n2:107: Dāne tapasi sūre ca, yassa na patthito yaso;
anya-e1001n2:110: Varo eko guṇī putto, na ca mūḷhasatānyapi;
anya-e1001n2:111: Eko cando tamo hanati, na ca tārāgaṇo tathā.
anya-e1001n2:114: Tassa putto bhave vasso, samiddho dhammiko suddhe.
anya-e1001n2:117: Pattetu soḷase vasse, puttaṁ mittaṁva ācare.
anya-e1001n2:119: Lālane bahavo dosā, tālane bahavo guṇā;
anya-e1001n2:120: Tasmā puttañca sissañca, tālaye na tu lālaye.
anya-e1001n2:123: Etesu kovido pañño, dhīro pāḷiṁ visodhaye.
anya-e1001n2:128: Candanaṁ sītalaṁ loke, candikā sītalā tato;
anya-e1001n2:146: Satesu jāyate sūro, sahassesu ca paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n2:147: Vuttā satasahassesu, dātā bhavati vā na vā.
anya-e1001n2:150: Sadese pūjito rājā, vidvā sabbattha pūjito.
anya-e1001n2:153: Asataṁ pana sabbesaṁ, dukkhahetu na saṁsayo.
anya-e1001n2:155: Paṇḍite sujane sante, sabbepi sujanā janā;
anya-e1001n2:159: Vinītaṁ yanti sabbepi, ko taṁ nāseyya paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:164: Ambuṁ pivanti no najjo, rukkho khādati no phalaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:165: Megho kvacipi no sassaṁ, paratthāya sataṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:170: Sataṁ pharusavācāhi, na yāti vikatiṁ mano;
anya-e1001n2:171: Tiṇukkāhi na sakkāva, tāpetuṁ sāgare jalaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:173: Selo yathā ekaghano, vātena na samīrati;
anya-e1001n2:180: Anuyyogena telāni, tilehi na sakkā laddhuṁ.
anya-e1001n2:182: Yathā hyekena cakkena, na rathassa pati bhave;
anya-e1001n2:183: Evaṁ purisakārena, vinā kammaṁ na sijjhati.
anya-e1001n2:185: Uyyāmena hi sijjhanti, kāriyāni na manorathaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:186: Na hi suttassa sīhassa, pavisanti migāmukhe.
anya-e1001n2:191: Mātā sattu pitā verī, yena bālo na pāṭhito;
anya-e1001n2:192: Na sobhate sabhāmajjhe, haṁsamajjhe bako yathā.
anya-e1001n2:204: Byasanena ca mūḷhānaṁ, nidāya kalahena vā.
anya-e1001n2:208: Niddāsīlī sabhāsīlī, anuṭṭhātā ca yo naro;
anya-e1001n2:212: Na hi saṁharate jutiṁ, cando caṇḍālavesme.
anya-e1001n2:214: Yatra vidvajjano natthi, sīlāghyo tatra appadhipi;
anya-e1001n2:217: Ṭhānabhaṭṭhā na sobhante, dantā kesā nakhā narā;
anya-e1001n2:228: Tādisaṁ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
anya-e1001n2:231: Khippaṁ dhammaṁ vijānāti, jivhā sūparasaṁ yathā.
anya-e1001n2:233: Dullabho purisājañño, na so sabbattha jāyati;
anya-e1001n2:234: Yattha so jāyatī dhīro, taṁ kulaṁ sukha medhati.
anya-e1001n2:240: Bhattaṁ ukkhaliyaṁ pakkaṁ, bhājanepi tathā bhave.
anya-e1001n2:248: Sele sele na maṇikaṁ, gaje gaje na muttikaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:249: Vane vane na candanaṁ, ṭhāne ṭhāne na paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:251: Paṇḍito sutasampanno, yattha atthīti ce suto;
anya-e1001n2:254: Potthakesu ca yaṁ sippaṁ, parahatthesu yaṁ dhanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:255: Yathākicce samuppanne, na taṁ sippaṁ na taṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:257: Uppalena jalaṁ jaññā, kiriyāya kulaṁ naro;
anya-e1001n2:264: Appassuto sutaṁ appaṁ, bahuṁ maññati mānavā;
anya-e1001n2:267: Paṭhame sippaṁ gaṇheyya, eseyya dutiye dhanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:268: Careyya tatiye dhammaṁ, esā janāna dhammatā.
anya-e1001n2:271: Paññāya atthaṁ jānāti, attho ñāto sukhāvaho.
anya-e1001n2:273: Natthi vijjāsamaṁ mittaṁ, na ca byādhisamo ripu;
anya-e1001n2:274: Na ca atthasamaṁ pemaṁ, na ca kammasamaṁ balaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:276: Vinā satthaṁ na gaccheyya, sūro saṅgāmabhūmiyaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:285: Haṁso majjhe na kākānaṁ, sīho gunnaṁ na sobhate;
anya-e1001n2:289: Attānurūpakaṁ kodhaṁ, yo jānāti sa paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:292: Appapūro ghaṭo khobhe, appakhīrā gāvī cale.
anya-e1001n2:294: Na titti rājā dhanamhi, paṇḍitopi subhāsite;
anya-e1001n2:295: Cakkhupi piyadassane, na titti sāgaro jale.
anya-e1001n2:300: Yo sisso sippalobhena, bahuṁ gaṇhāti taṁ sippaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:301: Mūgova supinaṁ passaṁ, kathetumpi na ussahe.
anya-e1001n2:303: Na bhijjetuṁ kumbhakāro, sobhetuṁ kumbha ghaṭati;
anya-e1001n2:310: Vāsitaṁ kānanaṁ sabbaṁ, suputtena kulaṁ yathā.
anya-e1001n2:312: Iṇakattā pitā sattu, mātā ca byabhicārinī;
anya-e1001n2:313: Bhariyā rūpavatī sattu, putto sattu apaṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:326: Paccuppannañca yo dhammaṁ, tattha tattha vipassati;
anya-e1001n2:329: Chandā dosā bhayā mohā, yo dhammaṁ nātivattati;
anya-e1001n2:335: Dullabhaṁ pākatikaṁ vākyaṁ, dullabho khemakaro suto;
anya-e1001n2:336: Dullabhā sadisī jāyā, dullabho sajano piyo.
anya-e1001n2:344: Apuṭṭho paṇḍito bherī, pajjunno hoti pucchito;
anya-e1001n2:345: Bālo puṭṭho apuṭṭho ca, bahuṁ vikatthate sadā.
anya-e1001n2:349: Cakkhumāssa yathā andho, sotavā badhiro yathā;
anya-e1001n2:354: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṁ sukhaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:359: Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇābhiyyo na maññati;
anya-e1001n2:360: Karaṁ purisakiccāni, so sukhaṁ na vihāyati.
anya-e1001n2:362: Yasmiṁdese na sammāno, na piyo na ca bandhavo;
anya-e1001n2:363: Na ca vijjāgamo koci, na tattha divasaṁ vase.
anya-e1001n2:365: Dhanavā sutavā rājā, nadī vajjo ime pañca;
anya-e1001n2:366: Yattha dese na vijjanti, na tattha divasaṁ vase.
anya-e1001n2:368: Nabhassa bhūsanaṁ cando, nārīnaṁ bhūsanaṁ pati;
anya-e1001n2:369: Chamāya bhūsanaṁ rājā, vijjā sabbassa bhūsanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:371: Sukhatthiko sace vijjaṁ, vijjatthiko caje sukhaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:372: Sukhatthino kuto vijjā, kuto vijjatthino sukhaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:375: Khaṇacāge kuto vijjā, kaṇacāge kato dhanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:380: Dhammo jaye no adhammo, saccaṁ jayati nāsaccaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:381: Khamā jayati no kodho, devo jayati nāsūro.
anya-e1001n2:383: Hatthassa bhūsanaṁ dānaṁ, saccaṁ kaṇṭhassa bhūsanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:384: Sotassa bhūsanaṁ satthaṁ, bhūsane kiṁ payojanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:386: Videsetu dhanaṁ vijjā, byasanesu dhanaṁ mati;
anya-e1001n2:387: Paraloke dhanaṁ dhammo, sīlaṁ sabbattha ve dhanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:389: Padose dīpako cando, pabhāte dīpako ravi;
anya-e1001n2:393: Na hi vañjhā vijānāti, guruṁ pasavavedanaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:395: Yassa natthi sayaṁ paññā, satthaṁ tassa karoti kiṁ;
anya-e1001n2:398: Kiṁ karissanti vattāro, sotaṁ yattha na vijjate;
anya-e1001n2:404: Natthi attasamaṁ pemaṁ, natthi dhaññasamaṁ dhanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:405: Natthi paññāsamā ābhā, vuṭṭhi ve paramā sarā.
anya-e1001n2:410: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṁ atthamattano;
anya-e1001n2:411: Buddhe dhamme ca saṅghe ca, dhīro saddhaṁ nivesaye.
anya-e1001n2:413: Guṇo seṭṭhaṅgataṁ yāti, na ucce sayane vase;
anya-e1001n2:414: Pāsādasikhare vāso, kāko kiṁ garuḷo siyā.
anya-e1001n2:417: Āgatañca bhayaṁ disvā, abhīto hoti paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n2:420: Malaṁ vaṇṇassa kosajjaṁ, pamādo rakkhato malaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:422: Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṁ thokaṁ khaṇe khaṇe;
anya-e1001n2:425: Yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṁ na kayirā na taṁ vade;
anya-e1001n2:429: Pantho ca saṅgāmo titthaṁ, aṭṭhete parivajjiyā.
anya-e1001n2:431: Rattoduṭṭho ca muḷho ca, mānī luddho tathālaso;
anya-e1001n2:432: Ekacintī ca bālo ca, ete atthavināsakā.
anya-e1001n2:434: Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca, bhīru āmisagaruko;
anya-e1001n2:435: Itthī soṇḍo paṇḍako ca, navamo dārakopi ca.
anya-e1001n2:437: Navate puggalā loke, ittarā calitā calā;
anya-e1001n2:438: Etehi mantitaṁ guyhaṁ, khippaṁ bhavati pākaṭaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:440: Yo niruttiṁ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:441: Pade pade vikaṅkheyya, vane andhagajo yathā.
anya-e1001n2:455: Nāgo gato naramukhe na jahāti līḷaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:460: Āhāre byavahāre ca, cattalajjo sadā bhave.
anya-e1001n2:465: Jaheyya pāpake mitte, bhajeyya paṇḍite jane;
anya-e1001n2:469: Yādisaṁ vappate bījaṁ, tādisaṁ harate phalaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:471: Chando nidānaṁ gāthānaṁ, akkharā tāsaṁ viyañjanaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:474: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṁ hitamattano;
anya-e1001n2:477: Dhīraṁ passe suṇe dhīraṁ, dhīrena sahasaṁvase;
anya-e1001n2:480: Nayaṁ nayati medhāvī, adhurāyaṁ na yuñjati;
anya-e1001n2:481: Sunayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
anya-e1001n2:482: Vinayaṁ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo.
anya-e1001n2:498: Tathā sakalavijjānaṁ, dhammassa ca dhanassa ca.
anya-e1001n2:500: Paṇḍitā dukkhaṁ patvāna, na bhavanti visādino;
anya-e1001n2:501: Pavissa rāhuno mukhaṁ, kiṁ no deti puna sasī.
anya-e1001n2:503: Javena assaṁ jānanti, vāhena ca balibaddhaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:506: Manasā cintitaṁ kammaṁ, vacasā na pakāsaye;
anya-e1001n2:509: Anabhyāse visaṁ vijjā, ajiṇṇe bhojanaṁ visaṁ;
anya-e1001n2:510: Visaṁ sabhā daliddassa, vuddhassa taruṇī visaṁ.
anya-e1001n2:511: Cattāro pañca ālope, ābhutvā udakaṁ pive;
anya-e1001n2:514: Yassa eso pasutopi, guṇavā pujjate naro;
anya-e1001n2:524: Na vade dakādī natthīti, mukhe ca vacanaṁ tathā.
anya-e1001n2:526: Sabbaṁ suṇāti sotena, sabbaṁ passati cakkhunā;
anya-e1001n2:527: Na ca diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ dhīro, sabbaṁ uccitu marahati.
anya-e1001n2:532: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṁ attamattano;
anya-e1001n2:533: Yoniso vicine dhammaṁ, evaṁ tattha visujjhati.
anya-e1001n2:536: Ārohati na yo saka-vaṁsaagge dhajo yathā.
anya-e1001n2:544: Narattaṁ dullabhaṁ loke, vijjā tatra sudullabhā;
anya-e1001n2:545: Kavittaṁ dullabhaṁ tatra, satti tatra sudullabhā.
